content: 1 simple lines by maanel yarn madelinetosh merino light fingering /4ply 100 % merino 420 yards -­ 384m /100 grams 2 skeins colour on the photo gossamer needles circular needle us 5 / 3 75 mm needles tools 4 stitchmarkers tapestry needle blocking wires optional finished size 72 cm depth at center x 165 cm wingspan / 28 5 x 65 after blocking abbreviations k knit p purl yo yarnover st s stitch es k2tog knit 2 sts together skp slip one knit one pass slip st over sk2togp slip one k2tog pass slip st over rs right side of the work ws wrong side of the work m middle stitch knit on rs purl on ws except in the ws row after a eyelet row where you have to knit all the stitches m marker pm place marker sm slip marker 2012 free pattern 2 stitches garter stitch knit every row eyelet row k3 * yo k2tog * repeat * * till 1 st before m yo k1 yo m yo k1 *yo k2tog * repeat * * till last 3 sts yo k3 notes this is a top down triangle shawl with 3 edge stitches and a 1 stitch center spine four increases are made on every rs row after first 3 edge sts before and after m before last 3 edge sts each row starts and ends with edge sts knit on every row garter stitch you can make the shawl smaller or larger before you start the border the sts between edge sts and m must be a multiple of 14 + 1 in this case there are 183 sts 182 + 1 between edge sts and m instructions cast on 3 sts and knit 6 row rotate work 90° knit and pick up 3 sts one in each garter ridge pick up and knit the 3 cast on sts = 9 sts tutorial http //westknits com/index php/2011/07/garter-­ tab-­ cast-­ on/ ws k3 p3 the second purl st is the middle stitch m k3 row 1 rs k3 yo knit till m yo m yo knit till last 3 sts yo k3 = 13 sts row 2 ws k3 purl till last 3 sts k3 row 3 k3 yo knit till m yo m yo knit till last 3 sts yo k3 = 17 sts row 4 k3 purl till last 3 sts k3 row 5 k3 yo knit till m yo m yo knit till last 3 sts yo k3 = 21 sts row 6 knit row 7 9 11 13 15 17 19 21 23 repeat row 1 row 8 10 14 16 20 22 repeat row 2 row 12 18 24 repeat row 6 57 sts row 25 eyelet row 61 sts row 26 knit 52 sts increased work row 1 26 five times more 321 sts 2012 free pattern 3 work row 1 24 once 48 sts increased 369 sts work row 1 and 2 4 sts increased 373 sts border follow
